name: Generic Rogue Shooter
description:
Eliminate wave after wave of enemies! Upgrade your ship and try to survive for as long as possible.

Press [p] to start the first wave!

Controls

Arrow / Vi - Keys to control your ship

Space Bar  to shoot

Shift to use ability!

1/2/3 - Shortcut Keys for some buttons

Esc - Pause

Features
  • Randomly generated Levels + Enemy Waves 
  • 3 playable ships  which all handle differently!
  • Powerups / collectables!
  • Persistent perks
  • Enemies with different behaviours!
  • Hard but in a chill way :)
